message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10,000. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $9,500. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $9,500 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with a price of $9,000. This reflects the value we place on the item while still being competitive. I look forward to your consideration of this revised offer.
